title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.703 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.703 - General

State Regulations
(a) No person may
operate a segment of pipeline, unless it is maintained in accordance with this

Part. (b) Each segment of pipeline
that becomes unsafe must be replaced, repaired or removed from
service. (c) The provisions of: sections
255.705, 255.706, 255.709, 255.711, 255.713, 255.715, 255.717 and
255.719
of this Part shall
pertain, as applicable, to all transmission lines, and all distribution mains
operating at 125 psig (862 kPa) or more in Class 3 and 4 locations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.703

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
